track.name: San Diego Serenade
comments: "The only person who can make me laugh in one song and cry in the next ", I second that.
This reminds me of the love my sister and her husband had before he sadly left us.  I want that kind of love.
Tom Waits - Songs After Closing Time - 1976  >> Video Live Concert >> http://theevilmonkeysrecords.blogspot.it/2012/07/tom-waits-songs-after-closing-time-1976.html
The only person who can make me laugh in one song and cry in the next
simply the best piece of music ever written.
yeah, "I never spoke 'I love you' 'til I cursed you in vain, I never felt my heartstrings until I nearly went insane" are some of my favorite lyrics ever
